module.name: Search
module.param: sourcetype="bro_notice" | fields sourcetype uid src_ip dest_ip src_port dest_port proto name msg | geoip dest_ip | chart sparkline count dc(src_ip) as src_ip_count dc(dest_ip) as dest_ip_count values(dest_port) as dest_port values(dest_ip_country_name) as dest_ip_country_name values(proto) as proto dc(msg) as msg_count by name

module.name: Search
module.param: sourcetype="bro_notice" name="$click.value$" | geoip dest_ip | stats count by _time, src_ip, dest_ip, dest_ip_country_name, msg, dest_port, proto

module.name: Search
module.param: sourcetype="bro_notice" name="$click.value$" | geoip dest_ip | stats count dc(dest_ip) as dest_ip_count sparkline values(dest_port) as dest_port values(dest_ip_country_name) as dest_ip_country_name by src_ip name

module.name: Search
module.param: sourcetype="bro_*" [search sourcetype="bro_notice" $click.cell1.name$="$click.cell1.value$" src_ip="$click.fields.src_ip$" | eval matched_uid=uid | fields + matched_uid _time | rename matched_uid as uid ] | geoip dest_ip | convert timeformat="%m/%d/%y %H:%M:%S" ctime(_time) AS event_time | fields event_time uid dest_ip src_ip dest_port dest_ip_country_name sourcetype | stats values(event_time) as event_time count sparkline values(sourcetype) as sourcetype values(src_ip) as src_ip values(dest_ip) as dest_ip values(dest_port) as dest_port values(dest_ip_country_name) as dest_ip_country_name by uid | sort - event_time

module.name: SimpleResultsHeader
module.param: Selected Notice and Originator/Source IP by UID

module.name: Search
module.param: sourcetype="bro_*" uid="$click.fields.uid$" | fields _time uid src_ip dest_ip sourcetype

module.name: Search
module.param: sourcetype="bro_conn" | fields uid conn_desc dest_ip src_ip src_port dest_port orig_cc resp_cc conn_state proto service orig_bytes resp_bytes | chart sparkline count dc(src_ip) as src_ip_count dc(dest_ip) as dest_ip_count sum(orig_bytes) as orig_bytes_sum sum(resp_bytes) as resp_bytes_sum by $conn_by$

module.name: Search
module.param: sourcetype="bro_conn" $conn_by$="$click.value$" | stats count by _time, src_ip, dest_ip, conn_desc, orig_cc, resp_cc, conn_state, service, dest_port, proto

module.name: Search
module.param: sourcetype="bro_conn" $conn_by$="$click.value$" | geoip dest_ip | stats count dc(dest_ip) as dest_ip_count sparkline values(dest_ip_country_name) as dest_ip_country_name by src_ip $conn_by$

module.name: Search
